str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular

str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A part, portion, share. From an obsolete but more primary form of meiromai; a division or share.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From kata and argeo; to be entirely idle, literally or figuratively.
